entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as being at the platform with his trolley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and fellow student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being new to Hogwarts like Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic where Harry and Ron are students. It is described as having platforms nine and ten.

entities.name: platforms nine and ten
entities.description: Two adjacent platforms at Hogwarts that the characters need to navigate between.

entities.name: the plump woman
entities.description: A kind woman who helps Harry and Ron. She is described as being the mother of several sons.

relationships.description: Harry needs to navigate between platforms nine and ten, which is explained by the plump woman.
Ron also needs to navigate between platforms nine and ten, like Harry.
Harry interacts with the plump woman who helps him understand how to get on to platform nine and a half.
Ron also interacts with the plump woman, who mentions that he is new to Hogwarts like Harry.
